text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: In preparation for the Derby, I need to train my body up a bit more!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: -I'll work even harder!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Maruzen-san and my dream… and then, from now on for Trainer-san too!
For the sake of an earnest, hard-working Sakura Chiyono O, the thing I should do as a trainer is-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh? Trainer-san, are you heading out too?
choice_data_list: I was thinking of heading to the bookstore

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: The bookstore! Could it be that Trainer-san is also going to get the newly released "Enyclopedia of Proverbs for Grasping Victory"…?!
choice_data_list: No, I want a different book…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Eh?! S-sorry! I guess I just thought we were birds of a feather… ahaha…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ah, but we're going to the same place, right? Since we have the chance, how about going together?
I didn't have a reason to refuse, so we ended up going to the bookstore together.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I did it! I was able to purchase it without issue!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: A charismatic new publication from the world of proverbs… I don't know what I would have done if it was sold out-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wait, Trainer-san?! Are you seriously planning on buying that mountain of books…?!
choice_data_list: Fu, it'll be split in to two bags so it'll be okay!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wawa! Your arms are trembling though?! I'll help you out!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Huff… Trainer-san, you're a bookworm, aren't you~?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …"Uma Musume Growth Theory] and [Lead Extension After Acceleration"? Huh? Aren't these all…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: To help me…?! Going out of your way, to do that-
choice_data_list: Since supporting you is all I can do
Since supporting you is all I can do

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: I've got to give it my all

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Uuuu… Thank you very much…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san and I, we're a little alike, aren't we?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Being steady, straight-forward, and earnestly building up through practice are about the only things we can do…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Struggling and struggling, just to advance even a little bit further… frantically continuing to do only that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: The presence of the person I admire looms too large, and there were times I felt I was at a standstill, but even then-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Continuing to work hard was worth it! Because I kept doing that, I was able to meet a wonderful trainer like you.
That night, while I was reading the books I had purchased-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: "To the hard-working Trainer-san"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Today was lots of fun! I got to learn a new thing about Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And, about those training books! You're probably in the middle of reading them right now, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san's feelings, made me very happy! But, please don't push yourself too hard, okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Lastly, I'll send Trainer-san another proverb. "Walking together, leaves 4 footprints!"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: From now on, let's both continue forward! Well then, see you at training!
I didn't really understand the proverb she sent me but, those feelings of hers were definitely made clear…
"Thank you" was the reply I started typing, but I stopped and decided to call instead.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: …Y-yes! This is Chiyono O! Is there something urgent-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Could it be, about the message I sent you earlier? Did I end up writing something weird…?!
choice_data_list: No, I just wanted to thank you directly

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Thank me… is it?
choice_data_list: It really raised my motiviation, thank you

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: No, no! I'm glad it was helpful…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: This time's proverb was pretty well made if I do say so myself! Feel free to use it, okay?
I'll think about how to use that proverb later… after that, I enjoyed having a chat with Sakura Chiyono O for a while.
